meta_description: The Detroit Institute of the Arts is located in Detroit’s cultural corridor. Our address is 5200 Woodward Avenue, Detroit, MI 48202.

admission_text:
# General Admission Tickets

 _Visit our Plan Your Visit page for additional information_[ _here_](/visit) _._

[Member tickets](https://tickets.dia.org/auth/313/members?ref=https%3A%2F%2Ftickets.dia.org%2Forders%2F313%2Ftickets%3FeventId%3D665f517e929a9057fbed8e0f%26cdEventIds%3D665f517e929a9057fbed8e0f%26date%3D2024-07-02T00:00:00) [Non-member tickets](https://tickets.dia.org/orders/313/calendar?eventId=665f517e929a9057fbed8e0f&cart) [Become a member](https://tickets.dia.org/membership/313/join)

Tri–County Residents

Tri–County Residents, please bring your ID to the front desk to receive your free admission. 

Tri–County Residents, please bring your ID to the front desk to receive your free admission. 

_Members enjoy greater access, exclusive events, and more!_

[Select galleries and other public spaces on the second floor of the museum are temporarily closed to guests](https://dia.org/2025-closures) to accommodate long-planned gallery improvements.

## Looking for event tickets?

[Event calendar](/events)
